content: Pet owners are always happy to share a memory about the time their dog responded to their distress by coming to them or trying to get their attention. But those seemed to just be stories, until new research in the journal Learning & Behavior found that dogs really do feel empathy toward their owners.
translations: ita:I proprietari di animali domestici sono sempre felici di condividere un ricordo di quando il loro cane ha risposto al lo
